message.body: Hey dude, just got done working my third double this week and wanted to check in. I hope you're feeling peaceful.
Hey dude, nice to hear from you. That's crazy. Your stamina is incredible. Why did you want to check in? I'm okay, if not peaceful. I hope you're peaceful too
(01/02) I don't mean to be catty. Just haven't heard from you in a while and I legitimately get worried for you. Maybe that's out of my place but I can't help l
(02/02) ooking out for you Mattie
I'm just trying to be casual. All is well, crazy but well.
And hearing anything from you is the best part of my day. How's that for telling you things you don't wanna hear.
Ok. Well I'm glad you're well
Youre Making it hard to reach out to you.
Why? Because I can't be casual? I'm trying
Reach out however you can. Please. I'm doing my best to keep it how you want it
These texts fall very quickly into crossing boundaries I'm trying hard to respect.
I want to be supportive as a friend but won't discuss us as its not productive, so if you'd like to be in contact those are the terms. If you can't do that you'll have to let me know
I don't know what the boundaries are. It seems like I can either have my emotions and not talk to you or pretend like I don't have feelings and talk to you
I'm doing the latter bc I can't do the former
Anymore that is
OK. Well I guess I'll pretend if that's what it takes. I'd rather hear your voice than nothing at all
Ok, I'm sorry this is uncomfortable. Im heading to bed. Have a good night
Me too. I hope we can talk like we used to someday soon. I truly miss hearing your thoughts. Whatever they may be
I'm just trying to make sense of this in what makes me comfortable and last night didn't. We can try something else, but I reserve that right. I can't text more than this today, heading to work
V vchat?
Kidding ...
(01/03) Ok I understand. I just hope you communicate these thoughts to me,about what makes you uncomfortable and about how we do this. Some conversations about
(02/03) "us" are inevitable. It's better for you and for me. I've just heard so little from you that when I do I just get all worked up. I'm doing my best to sh
(03/03) ow restraint. I really want to do this right. Have a good day at work and be peaceful
. You're a trooper!
